Caption: Huh, cloud shit. That's what we call snow where I'm from.
Name: CharacterDialogueBiomeArctic1

Caption: Let's hurry this up and get ouytta here. I don't much fancy this cold weather.
Name: CharacterDialogueBiomeArctic2

Caption: Damn slush ball. Let's hurry this up.
Name: CharacterDialogueBiomeArctic3

Caption: And I thought snow was bad. Now we got giant ice cubes? Ugh.
Name: CharacterDialogueBiomeArcticGlacial1

Caption: What a shithole. Nothing but ice as far as the eye can see.
Name: CharacterDialogueBiomeArcticGlacial2

Caption: Hope we don't make these missions a habit. Ice is really not my thing.
Name: CharacterDialogueBiomeArcticGlacial3

Caption: This place might be desolate, but at least it's warm.
Name: CharacterDialogueBiomeCanyon1

Caption: Nothing but rocks and sand. At least it aint snow.
Name: CharacterDialogueBiomeCanyon2

Caption: This place is pretty dry. Other than that, it's not so bad.
Name: CharacterDialogueBiomeCanyon3

Caption: These canyons all look the same. Let's not get lost.
Name: CharacterDialogueBiomeCanyonLush1

Caption: I'm surprised to see so much greenery in a place like this.
Name: CharacterDialogueBiomeCanyonLush2

Caption: These plants can obscure your view at the worst time. Take it slow and watch for cliffs.
Name: CharacterDialogueBiomeCanyonLush3

Caption: Now this is the kind of place most people would dream about living in.
Name: CharacterDialogueBiomeEarthlike

Caption: Now this place is deslote. Nothing but sand and more sand.
Name: CharacterDialogueBiomeEarthlikeDesert

Caption: I don’t like this thick forest. It's perfect for an ambush.
Name: CharacterDialogueBiomeForest1

Caption: These trees are nice to look at but they're also good cover. Stay sharp.
Name: CharacterDialogueBiomeForest2

Caption: This forest is nice and peaceful. Too bad it's not gonna last.
Name: CharacterDialogueBiomeForest3

Caption: Not gonna be long before winter hits this place. At least we'll be long gone.
Name: CharacterDialogueBiomeForestAutumn1

Caption: Let's move. We can appreciate the fall colors later.
Name: CharacterDialogueBiomeForestAutumn2

Caption: Now this is the kind of climate I could get used too.
Name: CharacterDialogueBiomeForestSummer1

Caption: This place is nice. I might retire here.
Name: CharacterDialogueBiomeForestSummer2

Caption: Hate the cold. Hate the snow. Let's hurry up and get outta here.
Name: CharacterDialogueBiomeForestWinter1

Caption: Not much to see here. Except all the snow.
Name: CharacterDialogueBiomeForestWinter2

Caption: Man, this place is a dead zone.
Name: CharacterDialogueBiomeHostile1

Caption: Wow, this is a lovely place.
Name: CharacterDialogueBiomeHostile2

Caption: Not a fan of 'no atmosphere' environments. We better hope our cockpit seals hold.
Name: CharacterDialogueBiomeHostileMoon

Caption: Anyone who lives in a place like this is either crazy, or desperate.
Name: CharacterDialogueBiomeHostileSulfurous1

Caption: This acid is gonna play hell with our 'mechs.
Name: CharacterDialogueBiomeHostileSulfurous2

Caption: I've been on missions to shitty places before. But this one pretty much tops them all.
Name: CharacterDialogueBiomeHostileVolcanic

Caption: Check your firing lines and prep for hostiles.
Name: CharacterDialogueMissionIntro2

Caption: Shouldn't be much to this one, but let's not get careless.
Name: CharacterDialogueMissionIntro3

Caption: Hope everyone is ready, cause here we go!
Name: CharacterDialogueMissionIntro4

Caption: Hmm, made the right call kid. You point'em out. I'll knock'em down.
Name: CharacterDialoguePilotHired

Caption: Navpoint received. We're on the move.
Name: CommandAffirmativeMoveLance2

Caption: No joy on that last order.
Name: CommandNegative2

Caption: Damnit! My mech's going critical and the ejections not functioning!
Name: DiedPilot

Caption: Shit! This 'mechs gonna blow. Need to eject!
Name: DiedUnitCritical

Caption: They took out one of ours!
Name: DiedUnitLance3

Caption: This mech is toast! I'm punching out!
Name: EjectedHelpless1

Caption: They just took out my last weapon. I'm outta here.
Name: EjectedHelpless3

Caption: This 'mech is falling apart around me. Ejecting.
Name: EjectedScared1

Caption: Nice core shot. That one is gonna blow!
Name: KillblowMechCriticalCongrats

Caption: Good kill boss. It's going critical!
Name: KillblowMechCriticalCongratsCommander

Caption: You blew that one's head clean off!
Name: KillblowMechHeadCongrats2

Caption: Look alive. We have hostiles in bound.
Name: SpotEnemy4

Caption: Get these assholes off me. I just lost a component!
Name: TakeDamageDestroyComponent1

Caption: Taking way too many hits. Losing components!
Name: TakeDamageDestroyComponent2

Caption: Bastards are blowing parts off my 'mech.
Name: TakeDamageDestroyComponent3

Caption: Component lost! Need some cover here.
Name: TakeDamageDestroyComponent4

Caption: This mech is coming apart around me!
Name: TakeDamageDestroyComponent5

Caption: Damnit. Thery're really gunning for me here.
Name: TakeDamageDestroyComponent6

Caption: Watch your aim! That's me you just hit!
Name: UnitMechFriendlyFireCommander1
